About.Hours & facilities: Open Tues-Thurs 9am-4pm and by appointment; closed Mon and Fri. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3 and photographs.

About.Access: 4-6 weeks' advance notice of visit required including details of research project so that material can be made ready. Proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Records, photographs and memorabilia relating to the College. (90% in-house).
